summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2310 for the improvement of California Avenue, from West Graham Street to Lowman Drive; and Lowman Drive, from California Avenue to Forty-fourth Avenue Southwest, all in The City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 23911, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
